subject: For skeptics?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
C2C next week *Tuesday June 8,
2010*<http://www.coasttocoastam.com/show/2010/06/08>

"Former nuclear physicist Stanton Friedman
<http://www.stantonfriedman.com/>and social scientist Kathleen
Marden <http://www.kathleen-marden.com/> will discuss the various examples
throughout history when scientists misjudged or ignored the potential for
advancements in science."

 You know, the stuff "science" was telling everyone was impossible while
inventors were doing it.

 F-S
